name: Dipakkumar Halani
my_business: JRM Export Private Limited, led by founder Dipak Halani, is a Government recognised STAR EXPORT HOUSE import-export company specializing in high-quality agricultural commodities like rice, sugar, and soybeans. With 25 years of industry experience, we've built a global network serving clients across numerous countries. We're proud to introduce HEPN, our new brand featuring a groundbreaking low glycemic index (GI) rice seed developed in collaboration with top Indian agricultural universities, reflecting our commitment to health, innovation, and sustainable farming practices.
top_product: hepn Low GI White Rice hepn Low GI Steam Rice
ideal_referral: Chief Procurement Officers or Head of Sourcing for International Health Food Chains (e.g., specialized grocery stores, online diet/wellness platforms) or Large Pharmaceutical/Nutrition Companies in North America, Europe, or the Middle East who are looking to source or co-brand scientifically-backed Low Glycemic Index (GI) rice products for the growing diabetes management and health-conscious consumer market.
top_problem_solved: Solving the 'Healthy Carb' Dilemma for Diabetics: We solve the problem for millions of health-conscious consumers and diabetics who want to enjoy authentic rice meals without the spike in blood sugar. Our scientifically-developed Low GI White and Steam Rice allows consumers to manage blood sugar levels effectively, addressing a critical need in the global shift towards preventative health and diabetes-friendly food choices.
my_favourite_bni_story: My initial connection to BNI was serendipitous: I was a member of a local club where a BNI chapter held its weekly meetings. Intrigued by the disciplined, professional energy I sensed, I looked up the organization's details and was immediately drawn to the core philosophy of Givers Gain. For a business focused on international export and strategic partnerships, the idea of a structured, supportive network focused on referral excellence resonated deeply with my business values. My decision to join was driven by the recognition that trust-based, structured networking is the most powerful path to sustainable business expansion, which is why I'm here today

name: Dr Pratik Pandya

I am DENTIST. Dr.Pratik Pandya has persued masters in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics( braces specialist and Invisalign Aligner specialist). My Dental Clinic named Smile Architect Dental Clinic is situated at Prahladnagar, Ahmedabad. I am also  working as chief consultant Orthodontist at Shalby Hospital Ahmedabad and AHCH (Amba Health Center  and Hospital, Adalaj,Gandhinagar ). I am also attached with DDU University, Nadiad as Assistant Professor. Dr.Pratik has an expertise in invisalign aligner system and invisible braces.
My wife Dr.Kinal Shah Pandya working with me at same clinic "smile architect dental clinic" has pursued her masters in Periodontics and Implantology ( gums problems and dental implants).
We perform all dental procedure with advanced technique.
